BR_text.BRdescription:
if there is anyone who are faced with the error below,
 
 "Loaded runtime CuDNN library: 7101 (compatibility version 7100) but source was compiled with 7004 (compatibility version 7000). "
 
 The thread below can be pointer to resolve this issue,
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/keras-team/keras/issues/9567>keras-team/keras#9567</denchmark-link>
 
 and the command lines on the reply below could be added to the dockerfile of the current horovod until Keras supports new version cuDNN.
 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/keras-team/keras/issues/9567#issuecomment-371566669>keras-team/keras#9567 (comment)</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text: It appears that NVIDIA changed their docker file next day after TF 1.6.0 was released, that's why it was not picked up.  I will update the Dockerfile, thanks for the fix!
